game.name: Gun Builder 2
game.description:
Have you ever thought what it takes to build up a revolver or hand pistol or what type of pieces they include? Are you crazy for the guns? Luckily, you are going to collect all the needful information how to construct your beloved gun in the second version of most popular Gun Builder. This interactive brand new action game makes it easier for you to get in touch with different types of weapons. With fabulous gameplay, cool graphics and easy controls, you will not come out of the game in the middle until you explore all its levels. 
Each level of this free online shooting game allows you to construct a unique gun to construct like an Uzi, Smith and Wesson and even a shotgun. All you need to do is assemble all the gun parts properly to complete each level and move to the next level where more complexities are waiting for you. Select from frame, grip and trigger to the right barrel to accomplish your task. Get ready to practice your shooting skills after constructing your gun in this cool gun building game! Combine all pieces of weapons wisely and get your own different weapons fast!
Apart from playing the assembly mode, you can also try out a creative mode where you can also show your creativity in a better way through different parts to get a hybrid gun. Put your gun building and knowledge skills to test to enjoy a hassle-free gun crafting today! There are two different modes to play for free in this best online gun building game. Do not forget to share your creative side with your friends and family after importing your creations in your device! Good luck to find more super fun firearm games here!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON THE PARTS AND FIT THEM IN THE GUN MODEL TO CREATE THE GUN, TAP ON GUN  THE GUN TO MOVE AND HIT THE TARGET
game.webControlKeys: CLICK ON THE PARTS AND FIT THEM IN THE GUN MODEL TO CREATE THE GUN, LEFT CLICK OF MOUSE TO SCROLL THE GUN AND HIT THE TARGET
